DOC.detailed_description: The number infant born CHD increase every year CHD infant suffer malnutrition.Recent study show increase energy intake CHD infant improve nutrition status.But high qualified evidence support high density formula promote infant ' nutrition status ensure safety . The hypothesis current study high density formula intake increase infants'weight 's safe . The current study adopts randomize , control intervention trial , give high density formula ( Infatrini,100kcal/100ml ) CHD infant intervention group normal density formula（Neocate,67kcal/100ml）in control group . Intervention begin infant start enteral nutrition operation continue 7days .
DOC.criteria: 1. diagnosis congenital heart disease symptom , sign , ultrasonic image examination 2. age 1 day 12 month 3. accept extracorporeal circulation openheart surgery 4. family member voluntarily participate study 1. patient disease cause nutrition disorder , gastrointestinal malformation , preoperative gastroesophageal reflux , genetic disease related growth restriction 2. accept total parenteral nutrition 3. predict length CCU stay less five day 4. patient abdominal distention , diarrhea , vomit
